description.raw:
I ran the following three commands:

`find . -name "*.cc" -exec sed -i -e 's/Copyright 2012 Open Source Robotics/Copyright 2013 Open Source Robotics/g' {} \;`

`find . -name "*.hh" -exec sed -i -e 's/Copyright 2012 Open Source Robotics/Copyright 2013 Open Source Robotics/g' {} \;`

`find . -name "*.h" -exec sed -i -e 's/Copyright 2012 Open Source Robotics/Copyright 2013 Open Source Robotics/g' {} \;`

and also edited LICENSE.

I targeted this to gazebo_2.0 because I think it's a special case where our copyright should be up-to-date, and it doesn't touch any actual code.
